thread_replies.text:
Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible :blobthumbsup:

Meanwhile, please check our https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TNV/pages/4049372305/How+tos. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

Hi @U03PN0VRC2F, did you try to check what was failing at the E2E before?

If you check your PR it flags what's failing, and in your case the API was returning 500 but expecting 200, so likely an issue with the service
Yesterday there was an incident (https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C09E0EB9CV9) apparently related to auth having issues, so it probably has a cascading issue making some E2E failing
By just rerunning your checks today https://github.com/hellofresh/web/actions/runs/17555279673?pr=57229

You can try checking these breadcrumbs next time an E2E fails, sometimes it's just staging having issues and you can just rerun after a while. And sometimes E2E are failing because of a good reason, alerting us something is wrong, so they are legitimately failing...
Apart from that you PR is still blocked because your team's E2E quarantine score
hope that helps :+1:
Thanks a lot @U0251UW1YUE

@U01AKGWGLC8 can we take care of this quickly so customers have more time to change their selections
@group hey firefighters, can someone please do this today?

synced with himash and i can take this over. was already running this when i saw the message early this morning but it's taking a while to generate the CSVs. i guess it's a lot of replacements.

i'm half way through. will post the results here once they're done :+1:
thank you!
thanks Bolo. Can you go through W52 since I created the menu yesterday
sure, running the 50 now. will include the 52 as well :+1:
here you go @U01B2LBUPND
Thanks much Bolo

hey Seb! We only run a few lines of commands to run a script of a service called Box-Content-Service to do these substitutions. We don't actually have much knowledge of its architecture to explore new iterations other than what we have currently.

This service is maintained by <#C049H9UE22X|>. I recommend you opening a support request in their channel to check if they could find a way to achieve what you need for reactivations, or if they could add this to their backlog for a future enhancement of the service.

You can open the request in that channel, but here are the main POC for you should you need as well: https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SHOPFOUND/pages/3977707521/Cart+Foundation+Squad
Hi @U0251UW1YUE ! Could you please help us opening a thread in <#C049H9UE22X|> asking them for support? We will be able to follow up there in case of their questions.

hey @U027201FQSV sure, but I believe we still need Seb's help in the thread to better expand on what he's missing on the substitutions to fine tune the support request and the motivations behind it, since he works closely with the operations after we generate the CSV from that service
Yes, sure. But just to have a starting point for discussion there.
https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C049H9UE22X/p1759132570939359
